news_header: World Property Ventures announces a $350 million joint-venture funding round for its subsidiary, World Property Markets, to enhance global real estate search platforms.
news_text: Michael Gerrity, founder of World Property Ventures (WPV), revealed plans for a $350 million joint-venture funding round for its subsidiary, World Property Markets. This subsidiary focuses on large-scale property listing search platforms, including Global Listings, World Property Search, and Better MLS. Gerrity emphasized the need for innovative technologies like AI and automation to improve the global real estate ecosystem, aiming to democratize access to property listings and information. The goal is to create AI-powered search platforms that could rival major tech companies in the real estate sector.
